languages.text: Вынырнувшая из-за угла примитивная технология мон-каев не пугает меня, но я понимаю, что план испорчен. Я вижу свежие отметины на коже Жертвы — парящие черепа накачали ее стимуляторами и нейтрализовали мой смертоносный боевой токсин.

I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.
languages.original_text: Вынырнувшая из-за угла примитивная технология мон-каев не пугает меня, но я понимаю, что план испорчен. Я вижу свежие отметины на коже Жертвы — парящие черепа накачали ее стимуляторами и нейтрализовали мой смертоносный боевой токсин.

traits.locale_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I see fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

languages.text: 我看到拐角处出现了猴子的原始技术造物。尽管我并不怕那些东西，但我意识到，我的计划遭到了阻碍。我在猎物的身上看到了注射的痕迹，那些漂浮在空中的头骨向猎物的身体里注射了兴奋剂，中和掉了本该让猎物当场毙命的战斗毒素。
languages.original_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

traits.locale_text: 我看到拐角处出现了猴子的原始技术造物。尽管我并不怕那些东西，但我意识到，我的计划遭到了阻碍。我在猎物的身上看到了注射的痕迹，那些漂浮在空中的头骨向猎物的身体里注射了兴奋剂，中和掉了本该让猎物当场毙命的战斗毒素。

languages.text: 原始的なモン＝ケイの技術が角の向こうから現れるのが見える。恐れてはいないが、自分の計画が挫かれたことに気づいた。獲物の肌に新たな痕跡を感じ取る。浮遊するスカルたちが刺激剤をその体に注入し、本来ならそいつを死に追いやっていたはずの戦闘毒素を中和していたのだ。
languages.original_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

traits.locale_text: 原始的なモン＝ケイの技術が角の向こうから現れるのが見える。恐れてはいないが、自分の計画が挫かれたことに気づいた。獲物の肌に新たな痕跡を感じ取る。浮遊するスカルたちが刺激剤をその体に注入し、本来ならそいつを死に追いやっていたはずの戦闘毒素を中和していたのだ。

languages.text: Ich sehe primitive Technologie der Chem-Pan-Sey aus der Ecke kommen, und obgleich ich sie nicht fürchte, erkenne ich, dass mein Plan durchkreuzt ist. Ich sehe frische Zeichen auf der Haut der Beute – die schwebenden Schädel haben Stimulanzien in ihren Körper gepumpt und das Kampftoxin neutralisiert, das ihr Schicksal hätte besiegeln sollen.
languages.original_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

traits.locale_text: Ich sehe primitive Technologie der Chem-Pan-Sey aus der Ecke kommen, und obgleich ich sie nicht fürchte, erkenne ich, dass mein Plan durchkreuzt ist. Ich sehe frische Zeichen auf der Haut der Beute – die schwebenden Schädel haben Stimulanzien in ihren Körper gepumpt und das Kampftoxin neutralisiert, das ihr Schicksal hätte besiegeln sollen.

languages.text: Köşeden ilkel mon-keigh teknolojisi beliriyor, korkmasam da artık planımın suya düştüğünü anlıyorum. Av'ın derisinde taze izler seçiyorum. Uçan kafatasları; bedenine uyarıcılar pompalamış, kaderini mühürleyecek muharebe toksinini etkisiz kılmışlar.
languages.original_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

traits.locale_text: Köşeden ilkel mon-keigh teknolojisi beliriyor, korkmasam da artık planımın suya düştüğünü anlıyorum. Av'ın derisinde taze izler seçiyorum. Uçan kafatasları; bedenine uyarıcılar pompalamış, kaderini mühürleyecek muharebe toksinini etkisiz kılmışlar.

languages.text: Veo tecnología mon-keigh primitiva surgir tras la esquina, y, aunque no la temo, comprendo que mi plan está frustrado. Percibo marcas frescas sobre la piel de la presa: las calaveras flotantes han llenado su cuerpo de estimulantes y han neutralizado la toxina de combate que debería haber sellado su destino.
languages.original_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

traits.locale_text: Veo tecnología mon-keigh primitiva surgir tras la esquina, y, aunque no la temo, comprendo que mi plan está frustrado. Percibo marcas frescas sobre la piel de la presa: las calaveras flotantes han llenado su cuerpo de estimulantes y han neutralizado la toxina de combate que debería haber sellado su destino.

languages.text: Je vois la technologie primitive des mon-keigh approcher et, bien que je ne la craigne pas, je me rends alors compte que mon plan a été contrecarré. Je perçois des marques fraîches sur la peau de la proie : les crânes volants ont injecté des stimulants dans son corps et neutralisé la toxine de combat qui aurait dû sceller son sort.
languages.original_text: I see primitive mon-keigh technology emerging from around the corner, and though I do not fear it, I realise that my plan is thwarted. I perceive fresh marks on the Prey's skin — the floating skulls have pumped stimulants into its body and neutralised the combat toxin that should have sealed its fate.

traits.locale_text: Je vois la technologie primitive des mon-keigh approcher et, bien que je ne la craigne pas, je me rends alors compte que mon plan a été contrecarré. Je perçois des marques fraîches sur la peau de la proie : les crânes volants ont injecté des stimulants dans son corps et neutralisé la toxine de combat qui aurait dû sceller son sort.
